text: mariyu (o muham'mad!) Vastavaniki memu niku purvam aneka pravaktalanu pampamu; varilo kondari vrttantam memu niku telipamu; marikondarini gurinci niku telupaledu. Mariyu allah anumati lenide e pravakta kuda e adbhuta kriyalanu (ayat lanu) svayanga ceyaledu. Kani allah ajna vaccinapudu, n'yayanga tirpu ceyabadutundi. Mariyu appudu asatyavadulu nastaniki guri avutaru
